name: Game of the goose
description:
In this game up to 6 players take a turn rolling a dice

You can play with AI enemies or just take turns on one device with your friends hot seat style

You roll the dice with Enter or Space Hold down enter or space to speed up the game

Once the dice is rolled your character walks forward.

Once you stop if you landed on a special field the effect of the field will activate

Special field effects range from moving forward some more steps, moving backwards, taking damage, skipping a turn or being locked in place until you roll a specific number

Every player starts with 3 HP. If you land on too many damage fields and lose all your HP you go back to the  last checkpoint.  Every new section in a board is a checkpoint

In the beginning you get to choose a class which has advantages and sometimes disadvantages compared to the default settings. This helps you choose your own playstyle
